definition.name: cloudflare-script
definition.description: Run inline scripts using the Cloudflare TypeScript SDK
definition.author: wei

inputs.name: script
inputs.description: TypeScript script to execute using Cloudflare SDK

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: The result of the script execution, if the script returns a value

evidence.reasoning: The action runs scripts using the Cloudflare TypeScript SDK, which is primarily a build-related task that involves executing code. It also relates to infrastructure as it interacts with Cloudflare services.
